channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: a954a0e0-f57f-4606-8421-fd7bd4e54b0f
Display name: Azure Device Onboarding Contributor
Description: Can read, write, or delete resources for onboarding services, policies, and device states.
Link: https://management.azure.com/a954a0e0-f57f-4606-8421-fd7bd4e54b0f?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: cc27d9db-08f8-4bdf-81a8-d03bb8db2dd9
Display name: Defender for AI Threat Protection Purview Operator
Description: Service role that provides permissions for Microsoft Defender for AI Threat Protection to work with Purview service
Link: https://management.azure.com/cc27d9db-08f8-4bdf-81a8-d03bb8db2dd9?api-version=2022-04-01
